mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl(order_tbl_id, product_id, member_id, product_count, product_price, check_stock, check_shipment, address) VALUE ( (select order_group_id from order_create_number where order_date = (select max(order_date) from order_create_number group by member_id) and member_id = #{orderEntity.memberId}), #{orderEntity.productId}, #{orderEntity.memberId}, #{orderEntity.productCount}, (select product_price from product where product_id = #{orderEntity.productId}), #{orderEntity.checkStock}, #{orderEntity.checkShipment}, #{orderEntity.address});
mapper.select: select * from order_tbl where member_id = #{memberId} and order_tbl_id = #{orderTblId}
